title: Brochure, "Brochure for "Lucille Tenazas: Installation, " Emily Davis Art Gallery, University of Akron, February 13 to MArch 2, 1990", 1990
title_raw: Brochure for "Lucille Tenazas: Installation, " Emily Davis Art Gallery, University of Akron, February 13 to MArch 2, 1990
medium: Offset lithograph on gray paper, vellum
description: Brochure in two parts with text and images throughout. All quotes by Tenazas. Inside pamphlet folded in half; translucent vellum bookjacket covers front and back surfaces. Cover of vellum jacket with letters of "TRANSPARENT" divided into 3 columns; quote at center of page. Inside pamphlet, front page: photographic image of person who seems to be standing behind frosted glass or plastic wall, figure blurred. Inside leaves: across top row, images of simple house, arrow, hand; on left side, 5 different arrows. On right side, photographic image of line of translucent windows; 2 people standing on other side, figures blurred. Photos of installation. Back cover: bio of artist, credits. Printed in black, blue, silver inks.

tombstone.epitaph: Brochure, "Brochure for "Lucille Tenazas: Installation, " Emily Davis Art Gallery, University of Akron, February 13 to MArch 2, 1990", 1990. Offset lithograph on gray paper, vellum. Gift of Lucille Tenazas. 1994-87-2-1,2.
